ai-tha-ap319:2.2_0: it’s taught by the great sage.
ai-tha-ap319:2.4_0: heading for the heaven of gods.
ai-tha-ap319:3.2_0: the great hermit went to the great hermit.
ai-tha-ap319:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap319:4.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap319:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap319:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap319:7.1_0: for the seventh senior, the senior, the seventh finest lady.
